attributes.action: stick to his words, British Jobs, for British People.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Forgeiners should not be given the right to work in the UK. We have lost too many jobs because of this matter, and the amounts of claiming which they have brought upon us. It will be easier for us British Citizens to work and speak 'our' language, instead of trying to tell a non british citizen what to do.

rejection.details: Please reword your petition so that it is clear exactly what action you would like to see the government take.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
